mapper.insert: insert into pzhwl.vehicle(vehicle_id, vehicle_number, type_id, latest_use, status, supplier, plate, purpose, automobile_id) VALUES (null, #{vehicleNumber}, #{typeId}, #{latestUse}, #{status},#{supplier}, #{plate}, #{purpose}, #{automobileId})
mapper.update: update pzhwl.vehicle set vehicle_number=#{vehicleNumber}, type_id=#{typeId}, latest_use=#{latestUse}, status=#{status}, supplier=#{supplier}, plate=#{plate}, purpose=#{purpose}, automobile_id=#{automobileId} where vehicle_id=#{vehicleId};
